issue.title: [CF 602] Icon to appear when Procs
issue.body:
This is likely bery simple.  I have spent quite a bit of time trying to figure out how to show an icon when a condition procs.  I would like to see an icon that shows when Pyroblast has proc'd.  Can you provide some guideance please?


> Posted by CurseForge user Iannet | Imported from CurseForge issue #602 | Raw
